raw_text:
Justice Morison Gurah
Contact Information:
Mobile: +233553852241 / +233578712319 / +233503603858
Email: cwaysimorison@gmail.com / cwaysimorison@outlook.com
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/justice-gurah-b53b2a245
GitHub: https://github.com/Cwaysi & https://github.com/PerryMoris
Address: Kasoa, Awutu Senya East, Central Region, Ghana
Professional Summary:
Passionate and motivated software engineer with a major in backend development,
completed a comprehensive one-year ALX Software Engineering program. Proficient in
designing and implementing scalable backend systems with hands-on experience in various
backend technologies. Strong ability to work collaboratively in a team and adapt to new
challenges.
Skills:
• Programming Languages: Python, JavaScript, VB.NET, C
• Frameworks & Libraries: Django, Node.js, Express.js
• Databases: MSSQL, PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite
• Tools & Platforms: Power BI, Looker Studio, Zapier, KOBO, Git, Docker, RESTful APIs
• Frontend Technologies: ReactJS, HTML, CSS
• Soft Skills: Problem-solving, teamwork, communication, adaptability
Tech Projects:
Hospital System (CHS) A full paperless desktop application built with Vb.Net and
other tools/libraries (being used by 12 hospitals across
Ghana)
School System (CSS) A complete system that streamlines the operation of pre-
tertiary schools, built with Django(python) and other
libraries (being used by 5 schools in Ghana and still
counting)
Ear Clinic System (CECS) A system built for Medwin Ear Clinic in Accra Ghana to
digitalize their operation. Built with Django(python)
Django(python) and other libraries/tools
Rehab System A system built for Livewell Rehab Consult in Accra Ghana
to digitalize their operation. Built with Django(python)
Django(python) and other libraries/tools
Microfinance System (CLS) A desktop application built with Vb.Net for small
microfinance businesses to manage loans, deposits, and
withdrawals.
Point of Sales (CPOS) A robust inventory management system for
supermarkets, pharmacies, and other sales shops. Being
used by 5 businesses in Ghana.
Project Tracker Application Developed a comprehensive project tracking system to
manage tasks, stakeholders, and activities efficiently.
Built with Django for backend and Reactjs for frontend
Farmer-to-Retailer Built a platform connecting farmers directly to retailers,
enhancing supply chain efficiency. Built in Django
In NaSIA Built basic systems to facilitate some operations like a
Leave management system, Front Desk (for receiving and
dispatching letters, and invitation management), basic
audit system.
Other basic Systems Built other basic systems in Flutter, Django, and React. All
in my Github account(private repositories)
Education:
ALX Software Engineering Program
Backend Development Major 2022 - 2023
University for Development Studies (Wa)
Bachelor of Education in Business Studies (Accounting Option) 2014 - 2018
Work Experience:
Assistant Inspector
National Schools Inspectorate Authority March 2022 - Present
• Assist IT team in system development-related tasks
• Develop inspection tools and assist IT to develop KOBO collect questionnaire
• Use Zapier and other automation tools to automate some processes in the inspection
process.
• Generate and Visualize data with Power BI and Looker Studio for comprehensive
report
• Conduct inspections to ensure compliance with Ministry of Education regulations.
• Quality assured reports from other field inspectors.
Field Installer
Ghana Digital Address Project January 2021 - 2022
• Trained installers on the application used for the project.
• Tested application modules before deployed
• Located properties, installed address plates, and prepared detailed reports.
Procurement/IT Officer
Justab Hospital Limited July 2019 - January 2021
• Built and managed hospital management system now called CHS.
• Managed procurement and accounting tasks, ensuring accurate financial records and
inventory management.
Achievements:
• Developed a full Hospital management system being used by 12 hospitals in Ghana.
• Developed desktop and web applications for supermarkets and currently in use.
• Built a software system for banks and earclinic centers.
• Built systems to facilitate the operation of some departments in my organization.
• Developed other systems that can be found in my GitHub repo (private and public)
Reference
Referees can be provided on request
